flawed_nl_solution:
Roberto skips 70.0 times per minute because 4200 / 60 = <<4200/60=70.0>>70.0.
Together they skip 510.0 times a minute.
They will skip 7650.0 times because 510.0 x 15 = <<510.0*15=7650.0>>7650.0

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 150.0, not 510.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
